name: Gawr Gura Gets Crushed To Death By A Boulder
name_original: Gawr Gura Gets Crushed To Death By A Boulder
description:
**WARNING NOT FOR FAINT OF HEART OR UNDER 18**

Because somebody had to do it.

I don't know if this is a bad idea but it probably is

yes this game is literally about crushing the hit Hololive VTuber "Gawr Gura" to death with a literal fucking boulder

the game is simple, host spawns in a game, friend joins using IP, host spawns in a multitude of Gura's up to 50 (unity netcode doesnt let me go any higher unless you are host, above 50 Gura will only show up on host) and then both people are to try to mimic the behaviour of the NPC's to try blend in, you get a point for killing the other player using your detection skills

Yes it has multiplayer, but you can also just start as host and go around killing them if you so want to, I wont judge you for it I promise.

By the way this is no hate to Gawr Gura, the original idea was just any person getting crushed to death and Gawr Gura just so happened to come in mind at the wrong place wrong time. We're sorry Gawr Gura

This was made for the weekly game jam WEEK 243 with the theme "boulder" and us at Tygur had our first thought be crushing people with them which is funny I think.

No, the rest of the menu buttons dont work, I dont have time to make them

by the way the lovely background ukulele music was shamelessly ripped of by this video 

the original is Gawr Gura's BGM but this is specifically the video i downloaded it from
